mapper.select:
/* 리소스 리스트 getList org/ezdevgroup/common/persist/acl/resource/ResourceMapper.xml */
SELECT R.RESOURCE_CD AS resourceCd , R.RESOURCE_NM AS resourceNm , R.RESOURCE_DC AS resourceDc , R.RESOURCE_URL AS resourceUrl , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(R.REG_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regDt , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(R.MODI_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modiDt
, IF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ACL_AUTH_RESOURCE WHERE RESOURCE_CD = R.RESOURCE_CD AND AUTH_CD = #{authCd})=1, 'Y', 'N') AS authResourceYn
FROM ACL_RESOURCE R
${searchKey} like '%${searchKwd}%'
ORDER BY R.RESOURCE_NM
